title: How to bind attack move click on left click?
body: I searched a lot of youtube videos about how to bind the left click of the mouse to attack move click, and i heard most of them are out of date, so here i come, does anybody knows how to bind it? I really need to know since im miss clicking a lot.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, since this binding isn't available in-game, it's not something we support or can assist with. Additionally, a lot of the time, attempts at these modifications can cause stuff in your keybindings to break if done incorrectly.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Well, is there any player that can help me out? That has his left click binded, or who can give me a link to a new thread not oudated?
